body_content.explanation: a remark that expresses approval, admiration, or respect:
examples: He complained that his husband never paid him any compliments anymore.
I take it as a compliment (= I am pleased) when people say I look like my mother.
Are you fishing for (= trying to get) compliments?

body_content.explanation: an action that expresses approval or respect:
examples: You should take it as a compliment when I fall asleep in your company - it means I'm relaxed.
Thank you so much for your help - I hope one day I'll be able to return/repay the compliment (= do something good for you).

body_content.explanation: an expression of your admiration or respect:
examples: That was an excellent meal! My compliments to the chef.

body_content.explanation: If you give something to someone with your compliments, you give it to that person free:
examples: We enclose a copy of our latest brochure, with our compliments.

body_content.explanation: to praise or express admiration for someone:
examples: I was just complimenting Robert on his wonderful food.
I must compliment you on your handling of a very difficult situation.
